  <script>
   if(!window.Promise || !window.IntersectionObserver) {
var xhrRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();
var timer;
xhrRequest.open('GET', 'https://s2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/@trinitymirrordigital/chameleon-polyfills/js/index.min.js?v=09d273e02d515692d7cbcc98aa75b72a', false);
xhrRequest.onreadystatechange = function() {
if (xhrRequest.readyState === 4) {
var polyfills = document.createElement("script");
polyfills.appendChild(document.createTextNode(xhrRequest.responseText));
document.head.appendChild(polyfills);
window.clearTimeout(timer);
xhrRequest = null;
}
};
xhrRequest.send(null);
window.setTimeout(function () {
if (xhrRequest && xhrRequest.readyState !== 4 && typeof xhrRequest.abort === 'function') {
xhrRequest.abort();
xhrRequest = null;
}
}, 15000);
}

          <a data-link-tracking="Header|DropDown|Text|Celebs and TV" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/showbiz-tv/">

     </a>

     </a>

     </a>

   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders solo wide primary channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="topStories" data-group-index="0">

      Watch Jewellery Quarter landmark clock tower being put back after £150k restoration
     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|topStories|Tag|Fire|index 6" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/all-about/jewellery-quarter">
       Jewellery Quarter
      </a>
      <div class="comments-count">
       <a aria-label="Comments for Watch Jewellery Quarter landmark clock tower being put back after £150k restoration" class="viafoura" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/watch-jewellery-quarter-landmark-clock-20220327#comments-section">
        <span class="count-number">
         <vf-conversations-count vf-container-id="birminghammail-prod-20220327">
         </vf-conversations-count>
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/watch-jewellery-quarter-landmark-clock-20220327">
       The iconic 118-year-old Chamberlain clock tower is ready to chime again after it was restored to its former glory and returned to the junction of Warstone Lane and Vyse Street
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight teaser-prominent">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Impact of HS2 on the landscape in 2021" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/gallery/impact-hs2-landscape-2021-20201326">
       <img alt="" data-src="https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/incoming/article20201261.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/2_DQP_BEM_160321RAILWAY_46JPG.jpg" data-srcset="https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/incoming/article20201261.ece/ALTERNATES/s508/2_DQP_BEM_160321RAILWAY_46JPG.jpg 508w, https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/incoming/article20201261.ece/ALTERNATES/s810/2_DQP_BEM_160321RAILWAY_46JPG.jpg 810w" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
      </a>
      <div class="gallery-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
      </div>
     </figure>
     <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/all-about/hs2">
      HS2
     </a>
     <a class="headline publication-font" data-link-tracking="" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/gallery/impact-hs2-landscape-2021-20201326">
      Impact of HS2 on the landscape in 2021
     </a>
     <div class="comments-count">
      <a aria-label="Comments for Impact of HS2 on the landscape in 2021" class="viafoura" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/gallery/impact-hs2-landscape-2021-20201326#comments-section">
       <span class="count-number">
        <vf-conversations-count vf-container-id="birminghammail-prod-20201326">
        </vf-conversations-count>
       </span>
      </a>
     </div>
     <a class="description" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/midlands-news/gallery/impact-hs2-landscape-2021-20201326">
      Such is the enormous scale of the HS2 project between Birmingham and London it's no wonder that construction work to build the high speed railway is having a significant impact on communities across the West Midlands that lie in its path.
     </a>
    </div>
   </div>

     </a>

      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/whats-on/family-kids-news/mums-share-supermarket-tips-through-20179102">
       These are the best times of day to go and the apps to use, according to parents plus how to use Google to speed up the time it takes to get through the tills
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>

   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders ensemble channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="sectionGroup3" data-group-index="0">
    <h3 class="publication-font">
     <a class="section-theme-indicator" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/all-about/birmingham-city-fc">
      Birmingham City FC
     </a>
    </h3>
    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight">

   <div class="pancake use-image-placeholders ensemble channel-ece_frontpage" data-group="sectionGroup5" data-group-index="0">
    <h3 class="publication-font">
     <a class="section-theme-indicator" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/sport/">
      Sport
     </a>
    </h3>
    <div class="teaser teaser-highlight">
     <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="Gary Neville nails what every Aston Villa fan is thinking after Tottenham loss" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|sectionGroup5|image|index 1" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/sport/football/transfer-news/gary-neville-aston-villa-tottenham-20226404">
       <img alt="" data-src="https://i2-prod.birminghammail.co.uk/incoming/article18106773.ece/ALTERNATES/s615/0_GettyImages-1200786965.jpg" src="/@trinitymirrordigital/marwood/TM/img/placeholders/transparent.png"/>
      </a>
     </figure>
     <a class="label section-theme-highlight" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|News|MostRecent|Tag|Fire|index 1" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/all-about/aston-villa-fc">
      Aston Villa FC
     </a>

          <figure class="section-theme-border" data-mod="image">
           <a aria-label="Line of Duty viewers have complaint - before show has even started" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRecent|image|index 1" href="https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/showbiz-tv/line-duty-viewers-complaint-before-20226359">

;

  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
} else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>

setTimeout(function() {

}, 3000);
});
  </script>
